solution_line_template: It's {current_year} and Mark was born in {mark_birth_year} so Mark is {current_year}-{mark_birth_year} = <<{current_year}-{mark_birth_year}={mark_age}>>{mark_age} years old
Graham is {graham_age_difference} years younger than Mark who is {mark_age} so Graham is {mark_age}-{graham_age_difference} = {graham_age} years old
Janice is 1/2 the age of Graham who is {graham_age} so Janice is {graham_age}/{janice_age_divisor} = <<{graham_age}/{janice_age_divisor}={janice_age}>>{janice_age} years old
